title: Roasted Peppers with Garlic, Basil and Tomatoes
ingredients: ['olive oil or cooking spray', '1 green pepper, halved and seeds removed', '1 red pepper, halved and seeds removed', '1 yellow pepper, halved and seeds removed', '300g cherry tomatoes, halved', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh basil', '8 cloves garlic, thinly sliced', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '1 tablespoon herb vinegar, or to taste']
